description.en: Google Messages is a simple, helpful messaging app that keeps you connected with the people who matter most. Text anyone from anywhere across devices.
description.ga_IE: Is feidhmchlár teachtaireachtaí simplí, cabhrach é Teachtaireachtaí Google a choinníonn nasctha leat leis na daoine is tábhachtaí.Cuir téacs ar bith ó áit ar bith thar na feistí.
